description: This file defines the CategoriesRepository class which provides data access methods for Category entities, including observing, saving, and deleting categories within the app's database.

classes.name: CategoriesRepository
classes.description: Repository class for managing Category data, providing methods to observe, save, and delete Category entities.

methods.name: observeCategories
methods.description: Returns a LiveData list of all Category objects, allowing UI components to observe changes.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Asynchronously inserts or updates a Category in the database, returning its ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Asynchronously deletes the specified Category from the database.
